name: Gold Reactor
description:
Gold Reactor is a tile-matching game with some tetris-like game dynamics.

By matching (reacting) elements together you earn gold. Special block elements can't be matched with each other, you can get rid of them by having neighboring elements react. Earn enough gold to spawn a bomb element!

Controls
  • Up arrow/Spacebar - Rotate falling piece.
  • Left arrow - Move falling piece left.
  • Right arrow - Move falling piece right.
  • Down arrow - Falling boost.
  • Esc - Pause the game.

Game features sound effects made with the Bfxr tool.
